outputs.name: folder
outputs.description: Path to the folder in which all of the files have been written.

inputs.name: _model
inputs.description:
A honeybee model object possessing all geometry, radiance modifiers
and simulation assets like Sensor Grids and Views.

inputs.name: _folder_
inputs.description:
An optional folder to into which the Model Radiance Folder
will be written. NOTE THAT DIRECTORIES INPUT HERE SHOULD NOT HAVE
ANY SPACES OR UNDERSCORES IN THE FILE PATH.

inputs.name: _write
inputs.description: Set to True to write the Model to a Radiance folder.

name: HB Model to Rad Folder
description:
Write a Honeybee Model to a Radiance Model Folder.
_
This Radiance Model Folder is what is used to run various types of Radiance
studies off of a consistent set of geometry and modifiers.
